name: FTS USA, LLC, et al., petitioners, v. Edward MONROE, et al., Individually and on Behalf of All Others Similarly Situated.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
FTS USA, LLC, et al., petitioners,
v.
Edward MONROE, et al., Individually and on Behalf of All Others Similarly Situated.
attorneys: On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit. Petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit for further consideration in light of Tyson Foods, Inc. v. Bouaphakeo, 577 U.S. ----, 136 S.Ct. 1036, 194 L.Ed.2d 124 (2016).
casebody.head_matter:
FTS USA, LLC, et al., petitioners,
v.
Edward MONROE, et al., Individually and on Behalf of All Others Similarly Situated.
No. 16-204.
Supreme Court of the United States
Dec. 12, 2016.
On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit. Petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit for further consideration in light of Tyson Foods, Inc. v. Bouaphakeo, 577 U.S. ----, 136 S.Ct. 1036, 194 L.Ed.2d 124 (2016).
